Simple Definition List

super man
Superman is an upcoming American superhero film based on the eponymous character from DC Comics. Produced by DC Studios, Troll Court Entertainment, and the Safran Company, and to be distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures
Grand Theft Auto VI
Grand Theft Auto VI is an upcoming action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games
God of War
God of War games every made, listed in chronological order of their release along with a short overview of each game included.
